description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en:
The mom characters who appear in the game *MamaFan* are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why... Why do such cute moms have to die?!”. Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then on a certain day, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of *MamaFan*... However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who's got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who's crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)
description.ja:
ゲームに登場するママキャラたちは、全員がバッドエンドルートしかない、あまりにも不遇すぎるサブヒロインでした――。

「なんで……なんでこんなかわいいママが死ななきゃならないんだよぉおお！」

彼女たちの救済ルートを求めるも、叶わず落胆の日々を送っていた主人公。だが、ある日突然このゲーム世界に転生することに。

・・・ただし、闇落ちルートしかない悪役貴族として。

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !

description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! description.en: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
description.ja: 堕落した悪魔たちにやる気を出させるため悪魔たちのアイドルとなる人間を捜しに人間界に降りてきた阿久津雅虎。彼は早くもアイドル候補・天音リリーを見つけ勧誘する。しかし、リリーの正体は阿久津たち悪魔の天敵の「天使」で!? 自らの身と仲間を守るためリリーを堕天させんとする阿久津と野望のため阿久津の更正を決意する
description.pt: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe - todo o caminho desde o Inferno, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!
description.pt-br: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe -todo o caminho desde o Infernio, para ser exato. description.en: Can sensei be the heroine? Please?    Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saigi Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!
description.ja: 過去のトラウマが原因で“先生”と呼ばれる人が嫌いな彩木慎は、校内一の美人教師・藤城真香に呼び出される。二人きりの生徒指導室、神妙な面持ちの先生が発したのは「わたしは、君が好きです」まさかの告白で…!?
description.pt-br: Devido a uma experiência traumática, eu nunca mais confiei em pessoas com o título de “professor”. Certo dia eu, Saigi Makoto, fui chamado depois da aula pela professora mais bela de toda a escola, Fujiki Maka-sensei, para de repente ela se confessar do nada e falar que continuará me perseguindo até eu disser que sim!

description.en:
Hell is crowded and the hall is closed. The king of the underworld, Chen Yan Luo, died and became a high school student! “I wanted to be a normal person, flirting with the school girl and going to my father-in-law’s house for dinner, but there are always rivals who come uninvited, so fuck it, I’m going to show my cards! Oh shit, here we again!”

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

description.en: Kokuyou Yuzuru, a bit of a plain boy, is always together with his best friend from childhood, Shiratama Kotaro. They thought they could stay together forever even after they entered middle school... One day, something happens that changes their relationship drastically.
description.ja:
ちょっぴり地味な男子「黒曜結弦」は親友の幼馴染「白玉小太郎」といつも一緒。
中学生になってもずっと一緒にいられると思ったのに…。
ある日二人の関係を大きく変える出来事が起きる。

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.cv:
Ҫитӗннӗ ҫыннӑн хурлӑ та тертлӗ пурнӑҫӗнче «туссем» кирлӗ.

Вӑйӑ кумппанийӗнче пулса пыракан халап хӑйӗн ӗҫӗнче тата ҫынсем хутшӑнвӗнче «виҫеллӗ» 23 ҫулти Уччукка Риххиттӑвӗ тата хӑйӗн ӗҫӗнче пӗтӗм вӑй паракан ӗҫчен 27 ҫулти Савуттуме Нуви тавра ҫаврӑнса тӑрать. Икӗ сӑнар, вӗсен пурнӑҫӗсем пӗр-пӗринпе ҫыхӑнмалла мар пек пулсан та, «туссем» пулса тӑраҫҫӗ...
Ҫапла пуҫланать те кӑшт ҫепӗҫ те кӑшт йывӑр ӳххисри «туссен» камичӗ!
description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!
